page.title: 09Playground Games
page.content: In school we have two playtimes everyday, one at 10.40 a.m. lasting 20 minutes and the second is after lunch. The most popular games among the girls are hopscotch, skipping, a guessing game called T.V. programmes and mystery games made up by the children with good imaginations. Freeze, Trees and Stuck-in-the-Mud are also favourites with the girls. The boys enjoy football played with a tennis ball, padder tennis in the summer and also cricket. Falcon is a fighting game in which everyone pretends to have a sword. To win the game one team has to "kill" the other team. The captain of each team is called the hunter. Bulldog can involve both boys and girls who have to run from one end of the playground to the other without being caught.
